title: RussiaUkraineTranslation
author: RussiaUkraineTranslation
content: Join the $MAXX-$MATIC Incubator!MAXX.Finance is a dual yield aggregator platform backed by validator nodes & protected by a gamified system to counter inflation to ensure a sustainable ecosystem. MAXX will be launching on #Polygon ðŸš€ðŸš€ðŸš€ free of any CeFi dependencies such as price correlations & counterparty risk. In the spirit of decentralization, the project will launch in the fairest way possible with no ICO, IDO, or any VC backing! (There is even a built-in system that prevents whale accumulation).The project will launch through a Liquidity Amplifier stage where all our community members will have an equal and fair chance to participate in the $MAXX distribution event that will run for 60 days and distribute 40B Free $MAXX tokens.Join the Liquidity Amplifier waiting list and claim your place in the largest DeFi Dapp launch of 2022. When you join the waiting list, you can win your share of: Â 5,000 in $MATIC shared by 100 entrants each time +10,000 new subscribers is reached ðŸ””Â 200,000,000 in $MAXX tokens is shared by 200 entrants who joined before the Liquidity Amplifier launch ðŸš€Increase your chances by completing more actions in the waitlist form and by sharing MAXX with the world! $MATIC $MAXX

comments.body: The giveaway is still live and after the giveaway there will be a free claim round where if you hold MATIC or HEX you can claim free MAXX tokens. That should be in early September.
